      • deleteOffer

        public <any> deleteOffer(java.lang.Long id)
        Delete an offer by its unique ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the offer to be deleted.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity containing a success message if the offer is deleted, or a not-found response.
